widget.name: DogeCoinDirectory
widget.description:
All Of Your DogeCoin Resources All In One Place. Download this app to have ready access to:
1) Dogecoin Stores - Where To Spend Your Dogecoin 2) Dogecoin Exchanges - Where To Buy and Sell Your Dogecoins or Exchange Them For Other Coins 3) Dogecoin Calculators - Know The Value of Dogecoin In USD or Other Currencies 4) Dogecoin Charts - See The Current Values Of Dogecoin In Different Chart Forms 5) Dogecoin Forums - See What Others Are Talking About When It Comes To Dogecoin 6) Dogecoin Faucets - Where To Get Free Dogecoin 7) Dogecoin Mining Information - How To Mine Dogecoin 8) Dogecoin Gambling & Casinos - Where To Play 9) More...
widget.author: PhoneGap Team
